long_description: With a seat and pedals positioned specifically for easy riding, the Electra Townie 21D Step-Through Women's Bike lets you cruise down the road in total comfort. Flat Foot Technology(TM) places the rider upright for comfortable, heads-up positioning; aft positioning allows a rider to place both feet on the ground at a stop. Step-through frame makes mounting and dismounting saddle quick and easy. Shimano front and rear derailleurs are operated by Revo twist shifters to provide smooth shifting through all 21 speeds; geared for hills as well as flats. Ergonomic saddle offer bump-smoothing comfort for all-day riding. Linear-pull brakes control both wheels, providing smooth, responsive deceleration. Semi-slick tires ensure a smooth and stable ride over a variety of road or gravel surfaces. Convenient platform pedals can be used with most casual shoes. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Townie 21D Step-Through Women's Bike are subject to change.
